```{r}
library(joycon)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(cowplot)
```

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg)) +
  geom_density(aes(fill = factor(gear)), alpha=0.8) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = joycon_pal("Splatoon")) +
  ggtitle(("Splatoon palette"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = cut, fill = cut)) + 
  geom_histogram(stat="count") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = joycon_pal(name = "SkywardSword", type = "continuous")) +
  ggtitle("Skyward Sword palette")
```

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=cut, y=price, fill = cut)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  scale_y_log10() + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = joycon_pal("Isabelle")) +
  ggtitle("Isabelle palette")
```

```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width))+
  geom_point(aes(color = Sepal.Length), size=5) + 
  scale_color_gradientn(colors = joycon_pal("AceAttorney", type = "continuous")) +
  ggtitle("Ace Attorney palette") +
  labs(caption = "(Yes, I know Ace Attorney is developed by Capcom)")
```

```{r}
df <- data.frame(1:5, 1:5)
colnames(df) <- c("x", "y")

a <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$RainbowRoad) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
b <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$NewHorizons) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
c <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$TwilightPrincess) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
d <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$PrincessPeach) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
e <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$Splatoon) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
f <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$WiiSports) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
g <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$DuckHunt) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
h <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$StarBits) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")
i <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_col(fill=joycon_palettes$AceAttorney) + theme_minimal() + xlab("") + ylab("")

myplots <- list(a,b,c,
                d,e,f,
                g,h,i)

j <- grid.arrange(grobs=myplots, ncol=3)

cowplot::ggdraw(j) + 
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill=NA, color = NA))
```
